title: (x) stockxpert website - Klampenborg {Manlio}
content:
hey guys,

i'm searching for the mainfont used on [Stockxpert](http://web.archive.org/web/20110310192352/http:/www.stockxpert.com/)  
 [Here you can see it in focus](http://web.archive.org/web/20110310192352/http:/www.stockxpert.com/img/en/royaltyfree.gif).

can't find it on myfonts.com (whatthefont) oder linotype (fontidentifier).

i think, i've seen it somewhere else before, so maybe you know the fontname.

thanks a lot and best regards,  
mocca
author: mocca

comments.content: Mighty close, but unfortunately there's a few differences.

**oh yes!**

thank you very much Manlio Napoli - could not find any differences between "klampenborg" and the font stockxpert-font.

did you find it by ["Identify a font"](http://web.archive.org/web/20110310192352/http:/www.identifont.com/identify.html) on the same page? because i thought it would be the same like the linotype fontidentifier. maybe they scan different font databases.

ok, thank you guys, maybe i can help you out anytime.

mocca

You're welcome! Yes, I found it by "Identify a font". If you have access to few letters only, use the [Identify specific letters](http://web.archive.org/web/20110310192352/http:/www.identifont.com/identify-sample.html) option.  
Bye
